head.supplied: The Free German Academy ¶ for Sciences, Arts and general Culture in ¶ Goethe's parental home ¶ to Baron Ferd von Mueller Mr.F.D.H. ¶ Melbourne ¶ Frankfurt on Main, 14 Fallow-month ¶ 1881...

div.p: Freies Deutsches Hochstift Frankfurter Goethemuseum, Frankfurt am Main.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: Letter not found; MS is a file copy kept by the Academy. MS annotation: '6/87/67 Abschrift versandt 16/VI 1881' [Copy sent 16 June 1881].

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
p.seg: für Wissenschaften, Künste und allgemeine Bildung in

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: an Herrn Baron von Müller Mr.F.D.H. Melbourne

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Unter bescheinigung des Empfanges Ihrer geehrten Zuschrift und Sendung vom (Poststempel unleserlich) eingegangen 7/VI, womit Sie die Güte hatten uns Ihre Werke:

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: 3., "Notes on a hitherto undefined species of Encephalarthos" zur Bereicherung der Bücherei des Hochstiftes freundlichst zu übermitteln, danken wir Ihnen verbindlichst und bitten um Erhaltung Ihres ferneren gütigen Wohlwollens für unsere Stiftung.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;

div.p: for Sciences, Arts and general Culture in

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p:
to Baron Ferd von Mueller Mr.F.D.H.
Meister des Freien Deutsches Hochstiftes [Master of the Free German Academy]. Melbourne

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;

div.p:
Frankfurt on Main, 14 Fallow-month
i.e. June.
1881

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p:
Under certification of receipt of your esteemed consignment of (post mark unreadable) received 7 June, with which you had the goodness most kindly to transmit for the enrichment of the library of the academy "Select Extra-Tropical Plants"
B81.01.04.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p:
"Plants of North-western Australia"
B81.03.02. and "Notes on a hitherto undefined species of Encephalarthos"
B81.03.01. we thank you kindly and request support of your further kindly goodwill for our academy.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

cell.p:
signed V.
Dr. G. H. Otto Volger.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;
